citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:04pm on
11-JUL-17.
The inspector was able to make contact with a shop worker. The shop worker confirmed that the Licensee was not
there or available for inspection at the time of inspection. The inspector left their card with the shop worker.

narrative:
2.126(b)
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:04pm on
11-JUL-17.
The inspector was able to make contact with a shop worker.  The shop worker confirmed that the Licensee was not
there or available for inspection at the time of inspection.  The inspector left their card with the shop worker.
